about_the_game:
Immerse Yourself in an Epic Turn-Based RPG Adventure!

Welcome to Orendale, where strategy meets storytelling in a rich, immersive world. Embark on an unforgettable journey where your choices shape your destiny and the fate of the world.



Plan your moves carefully in tactical turn-based combat. Exploit enemy weaknesses, and master a variety of skills and abilities to emerge victorious.



Create your own unique hero. Choose from a variety of classes, each with its own strengths and weaknesses. Develop your skills and equip your character with powerful gear.



Gather resources and craft your own weapons, armor, and items. Tailor your equipment to your playstyle and discover rare equipment that gives you the edge in battle.



Face off against formidable foes in epic encounters. Study their patterns, adapt your strategies, and utilize your allies’ unique abilities to defeat them.

Join the adventure today and shape your own legend in Orendale. Will you be the hero this world needs or the villain that destroys it?

Wishlist and Follow for Updates:
Stay up to date with the latest news, updates, and exclusive content. Add Orendale to your wishlist and follow us on Steam for more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7 / Windows® 8 / Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® D or AMD® Athlon™ 64 X2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8600 GT or ATI™ Radeon™ HD 2600XT
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo (2.2 GHz) or AMD® Athlon™ 64 X2 (2.6 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 240 GT or ATI™ Radeon™ HD 4850 or better

short_description: Orendale is a fantasy turn-based RPG with strategic elements. Embark on an epic journey while crafting powerful gears, and forming alliances with diverse combatants to fight 3v3 alongside them. Master a variety of unique classes and Fight formidable foes uncovering the secrets of a dynamic world.
